description: Gotta do something with the /b/Nuclear Waste/b/. There are two options from here:
An /b/Isotopic Centrifuge/b/ can reprocess /b/Nuclear Waste/b/ into /b/Plutonium/b/. Plutonium can then be /6/reprocessed back/6/ into /b/Fissle Fuel/b/, /6/recycling 80%/6/ of the fuel.

Using a Solar Neutron Activator allows you to reprocess Nuclear Waste into /b/Polonium/b/. /b/Polonium Pellets/b/ is a /6/high-end crafting material/6/ used for /b/Fusion Reactors/b/, /b/Supercritical Phase Shifters/b/ and more.
Both produce /b/Spent Nuclear Waste/b/, which is a /c/useless byproduct/c/ that you must /6/safely dispose of/6/.
